briefdescription.para: Constructor.

parameterdescription.para: If set to false, resource path is not initialized and SetResourcePath will have to be called explicitely

briefdescription.para: Return the ID of the Toolkit instance.

simplesect.para: nojs
The ID as as string

briefdescription.para: Get the resource path for the Toolkit instance.

simplesect.para: nojs
A string with the resource path

briefdescription.para: Set the resource path for the Toolkit instance.

detaileddescription.para: This method needs to be called if the constructor had initFont=false or if the resource path needs to be changed.

simplesect.para: nojs

parameterdescription.para: The path to the resource directory

simplesect.para: True if the resources was successfully loaded

briefdescription.para: Get the log content for the latest operation.

simplesect.para: The log content as a string

briefdescription.para: Return the version number.

simplesect.para: the version number as a string

briefdescription.para: Reset the seed used to generate MEI xml:id attribute values.

detaileddescription.para: Passing 0 will seed the xml:id generator with a random (time-based) seed value. This method will have no effect if the xml-id-checksum option is set.

parameterdescription.para: The seed value for generating the xml:id values (0 for a time-based random seed)

briefdescription.para: Load a file from the file system.

detaileddescription.para: Previously convert UTF16 files to UTF8 or extract files from MusicXML compressed files.

simplesect.para: nojs

parameterdescription.para: The filename to be loaded

simplesect.para: True if the file was successfully loaded

briefdescription.para: Load a string data with the type previously specified in the options.

detaileddescription.para: By default, the methods try to auto-detect the type.

parameterdescription.para: A string with the data (e.g., MEI data) to be loaded

simplesect.para: True if the data was successfully loaded

briefdescription.para: Load a MusicXML compressed file passed as base64 encoded string.

parameterdescription.para: A ZIP file as a base64 encoded string

simplesect.para: True if the data was successfully loaded

briefdescription.para: Load a MusicXML compressed file passed as a buffer of bytes.

parameterdescription.para: A ZIP file as a buffer of bytes
The size of the data buffer

simplesect.para: True if the data was successfully loaded

briefdescription.para: Validate the Plaine and Easie file from the file system.

detaileddescription.para: The method calls Toolkit::ValidatePAE.

simplesect.para: nojs

parameterdescription.para: The filename to be validated

simplesect.para: A stringified JSON object with the validation warnings or errors

briefdescription.para: Validate the Plaine and Easie code passed in the string data.

detaileddescription.para: A single JSON object is returned when there is a global input error. When reading the input succeeds, validation is grouped by input keys. The methods always returns errors in PAE pedantic mode. No data remains loaded after the validation.

parameterdescription.para: A string with the data in JSON or with PAE @ keys

simplesect.para: A stringified JSON object with the validation warnings or errors

briefdescription.para: Return the number of pages in the loaded document.

detaileddescription.para: The number of pages depends one the page size and if encoded layout was taken into account or not.

simplesect.para: The number of pages

briefdescription.para: Return a dictionary of all the options with their current value.

simplesect.para: A stringified JSON object

briefdescription.para: Return a dictionary of all the options with their default value.

simplesect.para: A stringified JSON object

briefdescription.para: Return all available options grouped by category.

detaileddescription.para: For each option, returns the type, the default value, and the minimum and maximum value (when available)

simplesect.para: A stringified JSON object

briefdescription.para: Set option values.

detaileddescription.para: The name of each option to be set is to be given as JSON key.

parameterdescription.para: A stringified JSON objects with the output options

simplesect.para: True if the options were successfully set

briefdescription.para: Get the value for an option.

simplesect.para: nojs

parameterdescription.para: The name of the option
True to get the default value of the option

simplesect.para: The option value as a string

briefdescription.para: Set the value for an option.

simplesect.para: nojs

parameterdescription.para: The name of the option
The option value as string

simplesect.para: True if the option was successfully set

briefdescription.para: Reset all options to default values.
Set the scale option.

simplesect.para: nojs

parameterdescription.para: the scale value as integer

simplesect.para: True if the option was successfully set

briefdescription.para: Get the scale option.

simplesect.para: nojs
the scale option as integer

briefdescription.para: Set the input from option.

simplesect.para: nojs

parameterdescription.para: the input from value as string

simplesect.para: True if the option was successfully set

briefdescription.para: Set the output to option.

simplesect.para: nojs

parameterdescription.para: the output to value as string

simplesect.para: True if the option was successfully set

briefdescription.para: Set the value for a selection.

detaileddescription.para: The selection will be applied only when some data is loaded or the layout is redone. The selection can be reset (cancelled) by passing an empty string or an empty JSON object. A selection across multiple mdivs is not possible.

parameterdescription.para: The selection as a stringified JSON object

simplesect.para: True if the selection was successfully parsed or reset

briefdescription.para: Edit the MEI data.

parameterdescription.para: The editor actions as a stringified JSON object

simplesect.para: True if the edit action was successfully applied

briefdescription.para: Return the editor status.

simplesect.para: The editor status as a string

briefdescription.para: Render the first page of the data to SVG.

detaileddescription.para: This method is a wrapper for setting options, loading data and rendering the first page. It will return an empty string if the options cannot be set or the data cannot be loaded.

parameterdescription.para: A string with the data (e.g., MEI data) to be loaded
A stringified JSON objects with the output options

simplesect.para: The SVG first page as a string

briefdescription.para: Render a page to SVG.

parameterdescription.para: The page to render (1-based)
True for including the xml declaration in the SVG output

simplesect.para: The SVG page as a string

briefdescription.para: Render a page to SVG and save it to the file.

simplesect.para: nojs

briefdescription.para: Render the document to MIDI.

simplesect.para: A MIDI file as a base64 encoded string

briefdescription.para: Render a document to MIDI and save it to the file.

simplesect.para: nojs

briefdescription.para: Render a document to Plaine and Easie.

detaileddescription.para: Only the top staff / layer is exported.

simplesect.para: The PAE as a string

briefdescription.para: Render a document to Plaine and Easie and save it to the file.

detaileddescription.para: Only the top staff / layer is exported.

simplesect.para: nojs

briefdescription.para: Render a document to a timemap.
Render a document to timemap and save it to the file.

simplesect.para: nojs

briefdescription.para: Get the humdrum buffer.

simplesect.para: The humdrum buffer as a string

briefdescription.para: Convert MEI data into Humdrum data.

simplesect.para: The Humdrum data as a string

briefdescription.para: Filter Humdrum data.

simplesect.para: The Humdrum data as a string

briefdescription.para: Convert Humdrum data to MIDI.

simplesect.para: The MIDI file as a base64-encoded string

briefdescription.para: Write the humdrum buffer to the file.

simplesect.para: nojs

briefdescription.para: Get the MEI as a string.

parameterdescription.para: A stringified JSON object with the output options pageNo: integer; (1-based), all pages if none (or 0) specified; scoreBased: true or false; true by default; removeIds: true or false; false by default - remove all @xml:id not used in the data;

briefdescription.para: Get the MEI and save it to the file.

simplesect.para: nojs

parameterdescription.para: The output filename
A stringified JSON object with the output options

simplesect.para: True if the file was successfully written

briefdescription.para: Return descriptive features as a JSON string.

detaileddescription.para: The features are tailored for implementing incipit search

parameterdescription.para: A stringified JSON object with the feature extraction options

simplesect.para: A stringified JSON object with the requested features

briefdescription.para: Returns array of IDs of elements being currently played.

parameterdescription.para: The time in milliseconds

simplesect.para: A stringified JSON object with the page and notes being played

briefdescription.para: Return the page on which the element is the ID (xml:id) is rendered.

detaileddescription.para: This takes into account the current layout options.

parameterdescription.para: the ID (xml:id) of the element being looked for

simplesect.para: the page number (1-based) where the element is (0 if not found)

briefdescription.para: Return element attributes as a JSON string.

detaileddescription.para: The attributes returned include the ones not supported by Verovio

parameterdescription.para: the ID (xml:id) of the element being looked for

simplesect.para: A stringified JSON object with all attributes

briefdescription.para: Returns the ID string of the notated (the original) element.

parameterdescription.para: the ID (xml:id) of the element being looked for

simplesect.para: A stringified JSON object with all IDs

briefdescription.para: Returns a vector of ID strings of all elements (the notated and the expanded) for a given element.

parameterdescription.para: the ID (xml:id) of the element being looked for

simplesect.para: A stringified JSON object with all IDs

briefdescription.para: Return the time at which the element is the ID (xml:id) is played.

detaileddescription.para: RenderToMIDI() must be called prior to using this method.

parameterdescription.para: the ID (xml:id) of the element being looked for

simplesect.para: The time in milliseconds

briefdescription.para: Return MIDI values of the element with the ID (xml:id)

detaileddescription.para: RenderToMIDI() must be called prior to using this method

parameterdescription.para: the ID (xml:id) of the element being looked for

simplesect.para: A stringified JSON object with the MIDI values

briefdescription.para: Return a JSON object string with the following key values for a given note.

detaileddescription.para: Return scoreTimeOnset, scoreTimeOffset, scoreTimeTiedDuration, realTimeOnsetMilliseconds, realTimeOffsetMilliseconds, realTimeTiedDurationMilliseconds.

parameterdescription.para: the ID (xml:id) of the element being looked for

simplesect.para: A stringified JSON object with the values

briefdescription.para: Redo the layout of the loaded data.

detaileddescription.para: This can be called once the rendering option were changed, for example with a new page (sceen) height or a new zoom level.

parameterdescription.para: A stringified JSON object with the action options resetCache: true or false; true by default;

briefdescription.para: Redo the layout of the pitch postitions of the current drawing page.

detaileddescription.para: Only the note vertical positions are recalculated with this method. RedoLayout() needs to be called for a full recalculation.

sectiondef.header: Public methods that are not listed in the documentation

briefdescription.para: Skip the layout on load to speed up MIDI or timemap output.
Render the page to the deviceContext.

detaileddescription.para: Page number is 1-based.

briefdescription.para: Return the Options object of the Toolkit instance.
Copy the data to the cstring internal buffer.
Return the content of the cstring internal buffer.

detaileddescription.para: Return "[unspecified]" if the buffer has not been allocated

briefdescription.para: Write the Humdrum buffer to the outputstream.
Copy the data to the humdrum internal buffer.
Return the content of the humdrum internal buffer.

detaileddescription.para: Return "[empty]" if the buffer has not been allocated

briefdescription.para: Clear the Humdrum buffer of any contents.
Get the input format.

simplesect.para: Input format enumeration

briefdescription.para: Measuring runtime.
The C buffer string.
Measuring runtime.
Identify the input file type for auto loading of input data.
Resets the vrv::logBuffer.
Return a dictionary of all the options.

parameterdescription.para: True for getting the default values and false for the current values

simplesect.para: A stringified JSON object
